headline: DoorDash and Ibotta Partner to Help Consumers Save on Everyday Purchases
summary: DENVER, January 07, 2025--Ibotta (NYSE: IBTA), which operates the largest digital promotions network in North America, and DoorDash (NASDAQ: DASH), the local commerce platform, today announced a multi-year strategic partnership to provide DoorDash customers with access to Ibotta’s industry-leading catalog of digital promotions. In joining the Ibotta Performance Network (IPN), DoorDash continues to create value for consumers with personalized promotions and coupons to further save on items in a r
